description: This table contains a list of all the users that have reviewed the order and whether that review was accepted or not.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table is determined by the number of users who reviewed this order.

columns.name: REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that reviewed the order.

columns.name: REVIEWED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when the order was reviewed.

columns.name: REVIEW_ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description:
This column contains Y/N to determine if the reviewer accepted the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No
